questions_and_notes: Why is this flux inconsistent with other, similar variables ("flux_of_carbon" vs. "flux_of_carbon_dioxide_expressed_as_carbon")?   Also,won't this root name likely be confused with "relative humidity"?
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 3 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
long_name: Carbon Mass Flux into Atmosphere Due to Heterotrophic Respiration from Litter on Land
comment: Needed to calculate litter bulk turnover time. Includes respiration from CWD as well.
